page.title: 09PROBUS DEMONSTRATION GARDENS
page.content: {Probus Demonstration Gardens contd. The gardens consist of 66 inter- connected sections,each dealing with a specific topic eg.patio gardens,garden designs,lawn trials,planting in exposure ,poisonous plants,Cornish wild flowers,natural windbreaks, vegetable growing,lilies, paving designs & greenhouses.During 1985 they have a special project exhibiting sculpture in the landscape which includes a Barbara Hepworth sculpture. Three full time gardeners are employed with 2 student gardeners,who stay for a maximum of 4 years.There are also 4 students on the Youth Training Scheme.In addition the Manpower Services Commission are running 3 construction projects which employ 3 full time & 3 part-time staff.Also cleaners & gate attendant. Admission-Adults 60p,children free.
